price: Whoever Allah causes to stray, there is none to guide him; He will leave them to wander blindly in their transgression.
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: man yuḍ'lili al-lahu falā hādiya lahu wayadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
